relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: Office Open XML (OOXML, ISO/IEC 29500, ECMA 376) Format Family
description: Overview of the family of formats defined by ISO/IEC 29500:  Information technology -- Document description and processing languages -- Office Open XML File Formats.  Includes DOCX, XLSX, and PPTX.
